meanings.definition: A chewy candy made from sugar, butter, and milk.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat caramels after dinner.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bag of caramels at the store.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the caramels from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: The sweet aroma of caramels filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The caramels melted in my mouth, leaving a delicious taste.

meanings.sent1: Her hair had a beautiful caramel hue.
meanings.sent2: The painting featured various shades of caramels.
meanings.sent3: The sunset painted the sky in lovely caramels and pinks.
meanings.sent4: The caramel tones of the wood gave the room a cozy feel.
meanings.sent5: The caramel color of the leaves signaled the arrival of autumn.
